param.name: use_asterisk
param.label: Use Asterisk Syntax
param.description:
If enabled, you can also use the syntax:
{* ...}.
The normal syntax will still work:
{anytags ...}.

param.name: security_level
param.label: Security Level
param.description: Set the level of security. AnyTags! won't work on content items with owners below this level.

param.name: security_level_php
param.label: PHP Security Level
param.description: Set the level of security for PHP. AnyTags! won't work on content items with owners below this level. If this Level is set lower than the overall Security Level, the PHP Security Level will be ignored.
